channel.title: German Ghost Car Commercial GOST CAUGHT ON TAPE!
channel.description:
"This is is a car advertisement from Germany . When they finished filming the ad, the people who made it, noticed something moving along the side of the car, like a ghostly white mist.
If you turn up the sound, you can also hear whispering. The ad was never put on TV because the unexplained ghostly phenomenon frightened the production team out of their wits. Watch it and about halfway through (after the car comes from behind the trees) look closely and you will see the white mist coming up from behind the car and then following it along the road!"
read that than watch this!!! http://www.thadman.com/temp/carghostclassic.mpg

item.title: German Ghost Car Commercial GOST CAUGHT ON TAPE!
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Akriam, post:10, topic:38588”][quote author=jme_009 link=topic=54374.msg673313#msg673313 date=1166908582]

I remember there was a time, when you’d see fake pictures and everyone would believe that the pictures were real(such as a road sign saying “Fuck you!”). Then everyone started realizing that photoshop is quite powerful and everything and these days we automatically assume that the pictures are always fake.

Well now that they have videos, everyone is all like “zpmg it must be reel!!1” There are a lot of video editing tools, such as Adobe Premier and others.

I agree with you half. People do post movies like this over and over. But, this one is actually not really edited like that. It is a movie…well…you’ll see if you watched it…ya…but people use the search before you post another topic about something I’m sure this has been posted before

People with no lives make stuff like this all the time. I did see it before, a few times and I just watched it again.

Theres a lot of other similar videos.
[/quote]

Oh sorry, I thought you thought that he made it Sorry.[/quote]
[hide=people who haven’t watched]I was saying that so other people will watch it without thinking it’s one of those scary things[/hide]

Read full topic
item.source: German Ghost Car Commercial GOST CAUGHT ON TAPE!
